longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and/or passport replacing documents must be valid
  on arrival. 
- British passports endorsed  British Citizen  that have been
  extended 12 months by an extension stamp contained within
  the passport are accepted.

Visa Issuance:
Visa required, except for Holders of British passports
endorsed British Citizen can obtain a visa on arrival for a
max. stay of 45 days.
Fees vary. (SEE NOTE 52375) (SEE NOTE 52379) 
    NOTE 52375: Provided holding:
   - 2 passport photos (3.5cm x 4.5cm);
   - passport copy.
    NOTE 52379: Those traveling for business must hold a
   letter of invitation from hosting organisation
vaccination:
Vaccinations not required.

Recommended:
- Malaria prophylaxis: malaria risk, mainly due to  P. vivax
  exists from June to October inclusive, particularly in
  southern areas (Khatlon Region), and in some central
  (Dushanbe), western (Gorno-Badakhstan), and northern
  (Leninabad Region) areas. Recommended prevention in risk
  areas: C.
